New Records: The Thunder achieved a season-high 75 points in the first half, their best offensive performance of the season.
The game marked a notable defensive performance, limiting the Rockets' inside scoring and forcing multiple turnovers.
Key Match Events: The Thunder's strong first half, their best of the season, was a key turning point.

Post-Match Reflections: The win highlighted the Thunder's ability to overcome initial struggles and perform at a high level.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game included notable performances by Shai Gilgeous-Alexander and Chet Holmgren, who led the Thunder's effort.
Others: The game was played at the Paycom Center in Oklahoma City, with a 7 p.m. CT start time.
